oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uncle Tom RCA-Victor Record Show - 1948-12-11 - Voice track
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: "Uncle Tom" Moore's transcribed voice track for the RCA-Victor Record Show to be broadcast December 11, 1948 over WNOX, Knoxville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Uncle Tom) -- Uncle Tom introduces Spade Cooley record 'Call Me Darling Do' -- Uncle Tom introduces Carter Family record 'Keep On The Sunny Side' -- Uncle Tom introduces Hank Snow record 'Just A Faded Petal From A Beautiful Bouquet' -- Uncle Tom introduces Charlie Monroe and his Kentucky Pardners record 'Don't Forget To Pray' -- Uncle Tom introduces Eddy Arnold record 'Then I Turned And Slowly Walked Away' -- Uncle Tom introduces Jesse Rogers record 'Blue Christmas' -- Closing statement (Uncle Tom)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WNOX (Radio station : Knoxville, Tenn.); Moore, Tom (Uncle Tom)
